body: Well I made a post about this a while back hoping it would get fix and I also reported it on GitHub a few months ago. I can't message most people that I have on my friends list wanted to know if there is anyway I can get this fixed. :l

replies.body:
Hmmm, I think you can message all friends which you added in the Avicus 1.0 time.(this Avicus with the old website)

Because I once tried to message EricV4 -> didn't work
But players I added before like sunrise728 -> did work

You've maybe added all your friends in the Avicus 1.0 time...
(Just that what I think, I don't have official informations.)
